document_data.caption: A map showing the Lord's Way in central Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Lord's Way
document_data.ends: The wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lord's Way''' was a road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Located in the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]] in central Zhentil Keep, the Lord's Way originated near the [[Black Altar]] in the west and passed east through the quarter passed the [[Tower High]] to end at the wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. Along the way the Lord's Way was intersected by [[Raven Street]], the [[Street of the Gods]], [[the Dark Road]], and [[Flostren's Memory]].
